name: SmoothScapist
description:
Will you be able to scape from ths prison

where madness reigns?

Or will you die while trying?

Just by using your own-crafted gun, defeat all the guards you will be facing while climbing the layers of this prison.Use it to shot the enemies and also jump higher when you shoot the floor while jumping.

Get as many points as you can

And most importantly,  DON'T LET MADNESS OVERTAKE YOU!!!

Controls are simple,

AD to move left and right

SpaceBar to jump

LeftClick/J to shoot

The game was made by a group of 4 classmates for a jam in our class

INSTRUCTIONS TO INSTALL IT

1-Unzip the file

2-Open the .exe 

3-Enjoy as much as you can!!
